bboxes.raw_text:
NEW YORK Three Negro
stars have been named to the
1864 Look Magazine All America
team.


The 22-man All America
squad. picked by the Football
Writer'S Association. was an
nounced recently.


The three players are Gale
Sayers of Kansas, Clarence Will
liams of Washington State and
Floyd Little Of Syracuse.


Sayers has few peers in
"open-field speed and explosive
ness"


Williams crates as the best
runner on the coast = from scrim-
mage. after catching pass, or
returning punt or kickoff" the
Magazine declared, "but he
is even stronger, possibly, as a
defensive halfback against the run
or the pass"


Little, the only sophomore to
win All America honors this year,
is a threat to go all the way
on any play" Look said. and
may rate, before he Is through,
with such past Orange heroes
as Jim Brown and the late Ernie
Davis"


The Football Writer'S As
ISOLATION, in picking the 1864
Look All America, followed a
precedent set by the late Grant
land Rice and selected a 22-man
team on which each player en-
joys equal first-string status.

3 Negroes Nam ed
to All America
Team

VIM H. Patterson Lodge Watt
elected officers for 1865:
Exalted Ruler Rosie Truman
Est. Leading Knight George
Campbell


Est. Loyal Knight = Calvin Will
liams


Est. Lect. Knight = Donald Low
cry


Secretary = Charles E. Williams
Urea surer Vernon Reynolds
Esquire Samuel Engram
Tiler David McClammy
Inner Guard = Homer Kennedy
Trustees Roscoe Patterson,
Virgil Berry, Arthur Black
shear, Will Galloway. Ken
meth Grimes


Jan. s, 1865 = Joint Installa-
tion of Officers Grand Canyon
Temple #437 is host this year.
VIM. H. Patterson Lodge Watt
and Grand Canyon Temple #437
extend to each and every one of
you HAPPY NEW YEAR.


Charlesetta McClammy,


Elks Reporter

PHOENIX, Ariz. An ex-
pansion program doubling the
size of its present facility was
announced by Pepsi-Cola Metro
politan Bottling Co., Inc. of Phoe-
nix, 1901 N. Black Canyon.


Frank Peck, vice president and
general manger of the bottling
company, said enlarged facilities
are needed to keep up with de-
mand for the firm products.
Construction will begin early in
1865.


An estimated 81 million will
be inve sted in the expansion pro-
gram, which includes renovation
of existing office space, purcha Sc
of equipment and additional land.


Peck pointed out that the COM
pany S volume ha increa sed four
times over what it was when the
present building was occupied in
1856.


When the present building was
opened, Pepsi was the only
product, but the firm now bottles
in multiple size Pepsi-Cola, Diet
Pepsi Cola, Teen and Patio
flavors.

Persons with experience as
cooks, walters, Waitress SEES,
checkers. cashiers, counter
men & women, cafeteria men
& women, commissary work
ers, bus boys, porters, and
coffeemen may apply at the
Stevens Office, Phoenix Trot-
ting Park, Van Buren, & Cot
ton Lane, Goodyear, Arizona.
Please bring references and
social security number.

A slice of enriched white or
whole grain bread with each
meal helps the dieter feel "full."
Yet, a slice of enriched white
bread contains only IS appetite
satisfying calories and supplies
many of the essential nutrients
needed daily for maintenance
of good health and sparkling vi
tality.

FOR RENT Unfurnished 2
Bdrm. Apt.


2343 E. Pueblo Call 276-9675

EARES BARBER SHOP
ll52 E. Washington

TACKSONS BEAUTY SHOPPE
1898 E. Madison
AL 2-o54l
